contentfulBlogPost.title: Our official podcast is now live

description.en-US: The official Blankets for T.O. podcast, Beyond the Blankets, will discuss homelessness and the role of Blankets for T.O. during each episode. Listen now on Spotify.

content.value: Need something new to listen to on the go? Want to learn more about how Blankets for T.O. was first set up? Listen to the official Blankets for T.O. podcast series, Beyond the Blankets, where our hosts Zaynab and Ayush discuss homelessness and Blankets for T.O. with various guests.

In our first episode, Zaynab discusses Blankets for T.O. with our founders and current co-presidents: Naman, Nimit and Rushil. We get a glimpse at what first motivated them to create the organization and what challenges they faced in setting it up. You will also get to hear some future plans for Blankets for T.O., as well as some of the best ways to aid our cause.
All episodes of Beyond the Blankets will be posted to Spotify. You can browse all episodes on our
On our podcast page of our website, can also listen to all episodes, read show transcripts, and access links and resources for each episode.
Our second episode will be featuring a special guest from the University of Toronto Scarborough community! Happy listening!

childMarkdownRemark.html: The first episode of our official podcast is now live! Listen to learn more about how Blankets for T.O. started and what our mission is.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The first episode of our official podcast is now live! Listen to learn more about how Blankets for T.O. started and what our mission is.
